languages.text: Если бессмертный-командир уже повержен, гибель этого существа активирует специальный протокол, предоставляющий +50% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} и +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the Immortal Commander is already dead, the death of this creature activates a special protocol granting +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the Immortal Commander is already dead, the death of this creature activates a special protocol granting +50% damage dealt and +10% armour penetration.

languages.text: 如果不朽者指挥官已经死亡，此生物死亡时会激活特殊协议，使{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%，{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高10%。
languages.original_text: If the Immortal Commander is already dead, the death of this creature activates a special protocol granting +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 如果不朽者指挥官已经死亡，此生物死亡时会激活特殊协议，使伤害提高50%，{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高10%。

languages.text: イモータル指揮官がすでに死んでいる場合、この生物の死によって特別プロトコルが発動され、与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+50%になり{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+10%となる。
languages.original_text: If the Immortal Commander is already dead, the death of this creature activates a special protocol granting +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: イモータル指揮官がすでに死んでいる場合、この生物の死によって特別プロトコルが発動され、与えるダメージが+50％になり{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+10％となる。

languages.text: Si el comandante inmortal ya está muerto, la muerte de esta criatura activa un protocolo especial que otorga +50 % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido y +10 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the Immortal Commander is already dead, the death of this creature activates a special protocol granting +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el comandante inmortal ya está muerto, la muerte de esta criatura activa un protocolo especial que otorga +50 % al daño infligido y +10 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.

languages.text: Ist der Unsterbliche Kommandant bereits tot, wird durch den Tod dieser Kreatur ein besonderes Protokoll aktiviert, das +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} gewährt.
languages.original_text: If the Immortal Commander is already dead, the death of this creature activates a special protocol granting +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Unsterbliche Kommandant bereits tot ist, wird durch den Tod dieser Kreatur ein besonderes Protokoll aktiviert, das +50% Schaden und +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} gewährt.

languages.text: Si le Commandant immortel a déjà été terrassé, sa mort active un protocole spécial conférant +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the Immortal Commander is already dead, the death of this creature activates a special protocol granting +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si le Commandant Immortel a déjà été terrassé, sa mort active un protocole spécial conférant +50 % de dégâts et +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.

languages.text: Layemut Komutanı zaten ölmüşse bu yaratığın ölümü, verilen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} +%50 ekleyen ve +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} kazandıran özel bir protokolü devreye sokar.
languages.original_text: If the Immortal Commander is already dead, the death of this creature activates a special protocol granting +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
